text: Mabel Patronella Mentor (19 October 1963 â€“ 23 August 2022), known as Vytjie Mentor, was a South African politician. She was a member of the National Assembly from 2002 until 2014. She represented the African National Congress. Mentor died after a long illness on 23 August 2022 at the age of 58. ==References== Category:1963 births Category:2022 deaths Category:South African politicians
title: Vytjie Mentor
